name: flaverr
description: Flavor an Error instance with the specified error code string or dictionary of customizations.

1.0.0.description: Flavor an Error instance with the specified error code string or dictionary of customizations.

1.2.0.name: flaverr
1.2.0.description: Flavor an Error instance with the specified error code string or dictionary of customizations.

scripts.custom-tests: echo "(No other custom tests yet.)" && echo # node ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test --recursive
scripts.lint: node ./node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint . --max-warnings=0 && echo '✔  Your code looks good.'
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run custom-tests
